be.ac.umons.model

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.umons.model.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditorMap

    public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements Model, java.lang.Cloneable
    A Model implementation that contains an array of hexagons

        public void sendLaser()
